de.freinsberg.pomecaloco

Class RaceActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • de.freinsberg.pomecaloco.RaceActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2

    public class RaceActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
    This activity is used during the active race and displays information that are calculated during the race.
    Author:
    freinsberg

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      This stops the race countdown and calls the method cancel() of the race class.
      void disableVisualSpeedUpdater()
      This method is called to disable the coordination-axis that show distance to best actual round time in 2 player mode.

      This method should be called when the race has ended properly.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the race countdown and calls init race to set the noe active context of the raceactity to the race class.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        This stops the race countdown and calls the method cancel() of the race class.

      • updateGUIElements

        public void updateGUIElements(int lane)
        This method is used to update the UI- Elements. The updateprocedere for the user interface runs on the UI Thread to make this work out of the class onCreate().
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the ui- Updates are needed.

      • finishGUIElements

        public void finishGUIElements(int lane)
        This method should be called when the race has ended properly. The finishing of the user interface runs on the UI Thread to make this work out of the class onCreate().
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the ui- finishing is needed.

      • disableVisualSpeedUpdater

        public void disableVisualSpeedUpdater()
        This method is called to disable the coordination-axis that show distance to best actual round time in 2 player mode.
